thumb.title: トライアングルストラテジー Piano Collections 〜8-bit アレンジver.2／Triangle Strategy Piano Collections - 8-bit Arrange
thumb.description: Many thanks to @lassoedthesos5529 for the feedback. In this newly uploaded version, I’ve added arpeggio effects, hoping to resolve the stiffness issue while keeping the overall sound natural.___これは『トライアングルストラテジー（TRIANGLE STRATEGY） Piano Collections』を 8-bit シンセサイザー化したバージョンです。原曲は『Triangle Strategy Piano Collections (Full Album)』【 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LDSINO2H-H0 】からのものです。This is an 8-bit synthesizer version of TRIANGLE STRATEGY Piano Collections. The original music comes from Triangle Strategy Piano Collections (Full Album) 【 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LDSINO2H-H0 】.00:00:00 01. TRIANGLE STRATEGY／Main Theme00:02:34 02. Frederica's Path／Until That Day00:07:19 03. He Who Is Lord00:10:55 04. Benedict's Path／No Matter The Cost00:16:54 05. Arise, Warriors00:20:09 06. Roland's Path／Unwavering Spear00:25:21 07. The Grand Duchy of Aesfrost00:29:06 08. Crimson Might00:33:10 09. The Goddess Smiles00:35:14 10. Combat／Resistance00:39:15 11. The Diary of Orlaea00:43:33 12. Resolute Heart00:47:28 13. Combat／Destiny
